text:
I could not find a complete HubSpot ER Diagram, so I made *The Best HubSpot ER Diagram Yet* in Lucidchart at <https://lucid.app/lucidchart/6a45d47c-99f2-40f0-a353-dec7dc151d95/edit?view_items=ZxZ9ObZFjKRx&invitationId=inv_4328c2ec-314f-4387-b8fd-aebe0b8898cb|https://lucid.app/lucidchart/6a45d47c-99f2-40f0-a353-dec7dc151d95/edit?view_items=ZxZ9ObZFjKRx&invitationId=inv_4328c2ec-314f-4387-b8fd-aebe0b8898cb>

Use the HubSpot CRM map to create your business processes and requirements. 

What entities or relationships would you add to it?
